law.text: To the extent that KRS 385.012 to 385.232, by virtue of KRS 385.222(2), does not apply to transfers made in a manner prescribed in the Gifts to Minors Act of Kentucky or to the powers, duties, and immunities conferred by transfers in that manner upon custodians and persons dealing with custodians, the repeal of the Gifts to Minors Act of Kentucky does not affect those transfers or those powers, duties, and immunities.
law.history: Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 182, sec. 25, effective July 15, 1986.
